mapper.select: SELECT a.*, COUNT(sm.STU_ID) AS member_count, row_number() over (order by a.study_date desc) rnum FROM ( SELECT s.study_code, study_title, study_date, sm.STU_ID, sm.SM_LEADER FROM study s LEFT OUTER JOIN study_member sm ON s.study_code = sm.study_code WHERE sm.STU_ID =#{userId} ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN study_member sm ON a.study_code = sm.study_code GROUP BY a.study_code, a.study_title, a.study_date, a.STU_ID, a.SM_LEADER

SELECT a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.stu_id ) AS rnum FROM ( SELECT s.stu_id, s.stu_name_ko, sm.sm_leader, a.dept_code, d.dept_name FROM ( SELECT sm.stu_id, sm.sm_leader FROM study_member sm WHERE sm.study_code = #{studyCode} ) sm INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.stu_id, a.dept_code FROM academic a ) a ON sm.stu_id = a.stu_id INNER JOIN student s ON sm.stu_id = s.stu_id INNER JOIN department d ON a.dept_code = d.dept_code ) a ORDER BY a.stu_id

select a.*, row_number() over (order by study_date desc) rnum FROM (select sm.study_code, study_title, study_date, sm.study_status from study s left outer join study_member sm on s.study_code = sm.study_code where sm.stu_id = #{studyId} and sm.STUDY_STATUS = 'N' )a
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM msg WHERE msg_sender = #{stuId} AND msg_content = #{msgContent}
mapper.select: select stu_id, cl.lec_code, sub_name, lrs_start, lrs_end, week_code from course_list cl, lecture_room_schedule lrs, lecture l, subject s where cl.lec_code = lrs.lec_code and cl.lec_code = l.lec_code and l.sub_code = s.sub_code and stu_id = #{stuId}
